modName: Bards Delight - A Lute Reworked in Three Flavors
summary: As the name suggests - the bard\'s lute gets new colors!
descriptionHtml:
Bard\'s Delight - - A Lute Reworked in Three Flavors
2011-12-16

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Flavor One - Darker, recolor only.
Flavor Two - Brighter, partially retextured.
Flavor Three - More retextured elements, used look.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hi there!
This is a TINY mod - a rather \'quick and dirty\' recoloring and partial retexturing of Skyrim\'s original lute.
I didn\'t really find the bright reddish original instrument fitting somehow.
Although rather a minor nuisance, I changed the facts to my liking.

Don\'t expect something grand - I am a noob at texturing.
I do like the outcome nevertheless - that\'s why I decided to share my results. Maybe there\'s someone else out there who feels about this little issue as I do.
If you are this person - I hope you enjoy!

Best regards!
Ali Bengali

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation / Uninstallation:
Just drop / remove the files into / from your Skyrim folder!
Or hand-place / remove the file named \"lute01.dds\" to / from your \"Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\clutter\\common\" folder.

Credits:
Bethesda
author: Ali Bengali
